name: PROTOCORE
description:
The bad news : you’re lost in a massive spaceship, your memory’s gone and there’s an army of robots that wants you dead. The good news? You have guns. Lots of guns. So lock and load and get your memories back, one bullet at a time.

PROTOCORE is a blood-pumping, nerve-wracking arcade shooter where you’ll fight your way across a randomly generated spaceship. Fight alone or with your friends to learn who you are and who wants you dead.

Shoot your way through an army of robots sent after you and turn them into a pile of smoldering metal.

  • Join your friends - Up to 4 players in coop mode.
  • Fight and evolve - Choose between three classes and upgrade your character as you play.
  • Full metal arsenal - 30 different weapons to reflect your combat style.
  • Two weapon fighting - Use two weapons at once independently.
  • Rogue-like experience - The levels change every time you play.
  • Evolving enemy AI - Intelligent enemies that will adapt to your tactics.
  • MOD-friendly- Make the game your own and share with the Protocore community!
  • Discover the story - Play the non linear campain mode and find out the secrets beyond Protocore.
  • Fight until death - Endless waves of ennemies will challenge you to the end.
